name: Max Gentlemen Sexy Business! Speed Dating Demo
name_original: Max Gentlemen Sexy Business! Speed Dating Demo
description:
Playable demo for Max Gentlemen Sexy Business!

Play with the character creator and go on speed dates to learn about the fine ladies and gents in Max Gentlemen Sexy Business!

Want to see more? Check out our Kickstarter!

Please share and bugs or comments with us and we'll maybe get to them before we die.

if Mac users are unable to open the app because it's an "unidentified developer"you just have to right click the file, then hit "open," I'm told.
